mapper.select: select id,name,case when is_parent=1 then CONCAT("/products/",id,".html") when is_parent=0 then concat("/products/",id,".html|",name) end as url, case when is_parent=0 then null when is_parent=1 then id end as parentId from tb_item_cat where parent_id='0';

select id,name,case when is_parent=1 then CONCAT("/products/",id,".html") when is_parent=0 then concat("/products/",id,".html|",name) end as url, case when is_parent=0 then null when is_parent=1 then id end as parentId from tb_item_cat where parent_id=#{parentId};
select id,name as text, case when is_parent =0 then null else "closed" end as state from tb_item_cat where parent_id = #{pid};
